thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Brother of Accused Florida School Shooter Arrested for Trespassing

author: Jon Kamp
title: Brother of Accused Florida School Shooter Arrested for Trespassing
text:
Florida authorities on Monday arrested Zachary Cruz, the younger brother of accused school shooter Nikolas Cruz, for trespassing at the high school where last month’s mass shooting took place.
Zachary Cruz had been warned by school officials to stay off the campus of Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Fla., according to the Broward County Sheriff’s Office. But the 18-year-old, a former student there, was spotted on closed-circuit video Monday afternoon.
...
